name: Pearl Pimple
description:
Try open the oyster and search for hidden treasure - pearls, gems, gold - capture the surprise and delight of the deep sea as you complete your collection of riches.

Relax and earn your fortune from the bounty of the sea - feel the oyster squish beneath your fingertip and feel the satisfaction of the “Pop!” as the pearl emerges and becomes yours.

Become the Emperor of Ocean Riches with Pearl Pimple!

To opt out of CrazyLabs sales of personal information as a California resident, please visit our Privacy Policy: https://crazylabs.com/app
